titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> 11 Dec = "Bronc"? s2: <*> address = "CdnN"? s3: <*> Dieppe = no idea, next to "Seine" <*> under Oct 23 = no idea, abbrev.

body.ab:
1935 GENET Mr. Jean Cazoulès - (Dordogne) chez Mme. Perry La Guépie (Tarn + Garonne) 2 rue Traversiere - Bergeaud Toulouse
6m. 1v. dep. 30 77v 17 July_ H+H (Henry James) 3 Aug. 3 Aug. p. 2.60 H. James man + author 23- 5- p. 2.20 Cowper_ (Fausset) 24- 23- p. 2.40 Art of the novel Sept 10 Sept 11 p. 4.20 Life & Times of L. Sterne 2v Oct 31 5 Nov p. 3.00 Marlowe + his circle 25 Story of Elizab. drama 25 Tempest (Cambridge 6/) 25 Nov. 25 Nov. p. 7.40 Shakespearean Tempest 5 Dec. 11 Dec p. 8.30 Marlowe + his poetry BB Life of Marlowe (T. <*>) Dec 31 Dec 30 2.60 On the Poems of Henry Vaughan BB returned ed. Blunden. Metaphysical Poets Leishman ? Jan 9 5.60 G.B.S. by Chesterton 38.35 renew subscription Feb 17 paid by inquired at PO Feb 10 postman 16.50 whether parcel from for 1/2 m. subsc Barcelona was delivered balance due for p.o. reports parcel delivered postage 8.35 SB wrote to inform Mme G. received money order 16.50 Feb 17
Address Route de Lannion Tréguier. (<*>) Ren. Dec 7. - March 7. 1937. 3m. 1v. 44.00 Mme genet Deposit 30.00 E.P.S. de garcons received. mandat. 74.00 Guingamp (Côtes du Nord) Dec. 7. Swift by Rossi + Hone sent back. " " sent p.c. Dec 28 Jan. 25. sent letter excusing for not sending book. Jan 25 Pope Sitwell sent letter . Feb 23. Sidney. Greville. 2.40 March 15 March 15 Sidney, J.A. Symonds (Eng. M. of. L.) April 29 Psychology of the Poet Shelley 29 Selected Poems Shelley, Clarke p. 2.80 29 sent pc to total 9.20 April 26_ Former Subscription to continue to March 31 _____ Renewed April 1st - Juin 1. 1v 50v 10% reduction proffesseur later for postage 9.20 10% provinces April 29 H.G. Wells. West. paid May 18 May 21 Wells. Brown. June 8 May 21 Conrad_ Walpole. p. 1.80 June 8
1941 GENET M. Jean Professeur au Collège de Garcons Dieppe (Seine <*>)
3 m 1 vol S 50 Dep 50 Oct. 23 Browning (Dowden Everyman) 28 Janv. <*> la 12 May 1942 left dep?
